Rsz5A yfS offered 70 private sale, a Huiea-
fsGassE.1n3 - bic farm, situated in pcncader
tssshS$ hundred, Newcastle County, Del. a.
4=s:ss-..azssbort mile south Of Newark; adjoln-
my lands of +. H. Ilotlbeckcr, the heirs OF viii
liam Lindsey, dec, Zachariah Jones, and others,
containing 100 acres, 'smorc or lcss'. his Farm
is on black oak aud hickory soil, in high state
Of cultivation, and equacd by few in the neigh
bourh0od;---it is well adapted to ali kinds Of
Grasses and Grain;-has ON il a young thriving
orchard Of about one hundred trees Of choice
fruit; an excellent bottom meadow, through
which runs a never failing stream; and seven tn
lagcs Or fields, all under good fence. The i'm.
pfovements are a two story log dwelling house,
well weathcr-boardel outside aud lathed and
plastered inside, having three rooms down and
four up stairs, with first rate cellar under the
whole-Also, kitchen adjoining, with pump
OF excellent water at the door: stone mlk
house and smoke house; frame barn, nearly
new, with excellent stAbing underneath, suiii-
cent to hold ten or twelve head Of horses, be-
sides mich COWS, calves, &c. Further descrip-
tlon Is deemed unnecessary, as il IS expected
that any wishingto purchase will view the prem.
ises, which the subscriber, living thereon, can
show, and make known the conditions Of sale.

l. TALES, original and selected; ESSAYS,

eign publications. GEOGRAPHICAL. oKt1CH-

telligenee, foreign and domestic occurrences,

i'll ENGRAVtNGS,-The FIRST number of

Alhambra, Ancient Palace of the Moorish

cent OF Mont Blanc. Cascade near Oysans, lait-

ume, subscribers will be furnished gratis wit
